description: Manage your Clockify time entries effortlessly by sending prompts to an LLM. Add, view, and control your time tracking directly through AI-powered interactions. Simplify your time management workflow with seamless integration to Clockify.

tools.name: create-time-entry
tools.description: Register a new time entry of a task or break in a workspace

end.description: The end of the time entry

start.description: The start of the time entry

billable.description: If the task is billable or not

projectId.description: The id of the project associated with this time entry

description.description: The description of the time entry

workspaceId.description: The id of the workspace that gonna be saved the time entry

tools.name: get-projects
tools.description: Get workspace projects id and name, the projects can be associated with time entries

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace that you need to get the projects from

tools.name: list-time-entries
tools.description: Get registered time entries from a workspace

end.description: End time of the entry to search for

start.description: Start time of the entry to search for

userId.description: The id of the user that gonna have the entries searched, default is the current user id

project.description: The id of the project to search for entries

description.description: The time entry description to search for

workspaceId.description: The id of the workspace that gonna search for the entries

tools.name: get-current-user
tools.description: Get the current user id and name, to search for entries is required to have the user id

tools.name: get-workspaces
tools.description: Get user available workspaces id and name, a workspace is required to manage time entries

tools.name: delete-time-entry
tools.description: Delete a specific time entry from a workspace

timeEntryId.description: The id of the time entry to be deleted

workspaceId.description: The id of the workspace where the time entry is located

tools.name: edit-time-entry
tools.description: Edit an existing time entry in a workspace

end.description: The end of the time entry

start.description: The start of the time entry

billable.description: If the task is billable or not

projectId.description: The id of the project associated with this time entry

description.description: The description of the time entry

timeEntryId.description: The id of the time entry to be edited

workspaceId.description: The id of the workspace where the time entry is located
